name: 萨拉·库吉尼
introduction: Sarah developed a passion for performing arts at a young age. She began taking singing lessons and participated with plays and musicals in school. Sarah attended the Lehigh Valley High School for the Performing Arts, where she honed her craft and participated in numerous school productions and sang in many choir ensembles.Sarah's most noticeable role was Ginger in Living Proof Production's film "Bitter Taste of Ginger"where she portrayed the leading character of the film. Sarah has traveled to numerous film festivals and was awarded (insert awards here). Other notable performances are (insert names here).Off-screen, Sarah enjoys cosplaying, reading, playing video games, watching film/tv, and traveling. Sarah continues to challenge herself with diverse roles and she is always up for a challenge.
